mapper.sql: id, belong_obj_id, schema_id, name, data_type, is_primary, nullable, aim_port, belong_obj_type
mapper.select: select id,belong_obj_id,schema_id,name,data_type,is_primary,nullable,aim_port,belong_obj_type,is_delete,gmt_create,gmt_modified from attribute where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_delete = 0

mapper.update: update attribute set is_delete = 1 where id = #{ID,jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_delete = 0
